metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1221 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Insufficient policy enforcement in Extensions API in Google Chrome prior to111.0.5563.64 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to bypass navigation restrictions via a crafted ChromeExtension. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
